body_html: OK, so the suggestion to use DistributedDataParallel to solve possible GIL issues when scaling with GPUs, which I referenced previously, implies actually launching a single python process for each GPU rather than just trying to swap in DDP for the old DataParallel? I noticed @csarofeen submitted a PR which would make this possible in the imagenet example. pytorch/examples#202
